title: Barbecued Asian ginger pork chops
ingredients: ['110ml (4 fl oz) orange juice', '2 tablespoons soy sauce', '2 tablespoons minced fresh ginger root', '2 tablespoons grated orange zest', '1 teaspoon minced garlic', '1/2 teaspoon minced garlic', '1/2 teaspoon crushed chillies, such as Schwartz', '1/2 teaspoon salt', '6 pork loin chops']
